mapper.select: select cs.cs_num, csq.cs_question_title, cs.cs_type, csq.cs_question_option, csq.cs_question_explanation, cs.cs_answer_num from cs_question_tb csq left join cs_tb cs ON cs.cs_num = csq.cs_num where csq.cs_num=#{cs_num}

select rownum, cs_num, cs_type, cs_question_title, cs_user_check, user_email from( select rownum, cs_num, cs_type, cs_question_title, cs_user_check, user_email from (select row_number() over(order by cs_num desc) as rownum, cs.cs_num, cs.cs_type, csq.cs_question_title, csu.cs_user_check, csu.user_email from cs_tb cs left join cs_question_tb csq ON cs.cs_num = csq.cs_num left join cs_user csu ON cs.cs_num = csu.cs_num order by cs_num desc) a where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) aa where rownum > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
